name: The Coiner-Falham Experiment
description:
The Coiner-Falham Precognition Sequencer is used to semi-safely navigate liminal spaces. The technology is still experimental, which means that it can occasionally malfunction. The incident at the Greenland research facility caused all of your colleagues to disappear, leaving you trapped at the edge of an unknown liminal subspace.

Made for UT Pro Game Jam 2022 in 48h for the theme Plan then Execute

  • Markus Aksli
  • Mattias Aksli
  • Music by Mark Robin Kalder

To progress through text and confirm choices, you can use:

  • F
  • Spacebar
  • Enter
  • Gamepad A button
